医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究：2021 年儿童税收抵免扩大为大流行病期间的家庭提供了帮助美国恢复扩大儿童税收抵免 (CTC) 的提案正在等待参议院投票，波士顿大学公共卫生学院 (BUSPH) 研究人员领导的一项新研究显示，现已到期的 2021 年 CTC 扩大有利于正在经历困难的家庭。由于 COVID-19 大流行引发的健康或就业挑战而导致的财务挫折。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Study-2021-Child-Tax-Credit-expansion-aided-families-during-pandemic-hardship.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Study-2021-Child-Tax-Credit-expansion-aided-families-during-pandemic-hardship.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5824e60-7ea0-41c0-b0b4-a8d252605047 Tue, 20 Feb 2024 23:54:00 -0500 Study: 2021 Child Tax Credit expansion aided families during pandemic hardship
幼儿被动使用视频会对语言发展产生负面影响SMU 心理学家 Sarah Kucker 及其同事的一项新研究表明，幼儿被动使用视频会对语言发展产生负面影响，但他们的照顾者让他们接触数字媒体的动机也可能减轻这种影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Passive-video-use-among-toddlers-can-male-affect-language-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Passive-video-use-among-toddlers-can-male-affect-language-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5892c54e-1b5e-4776-826c-79a850c9f79f Tue, 20 Feb 2024 23:46:09 -0500 Passive video use among toddlers can negatively affect language development
研究发现膳食硫胺素摄入量与精神敏锐度恶化之间存在 J 形关联发表在开放获取期刊《普通精神病学》上的研究表明，在认知健康的老年人中，膳食硫胺素（维生素 B1）与精神敏锐度恶化之间似乎存在 J 形曲线。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Study-finds-J-shape-association- Between-dietary-thiamine-intake-and-worsening-mental-acuity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Study-finds-J-shape-association- Between-dietary-thiamine-intake-and-worsening-mental-acuity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cdb7bb39-98ec-4e86-be41-1dc35d613e56 Tue, 20 Feb 2024 23:42:02 -0500 Study finds J-shaped association between dietary thiamine intake and worsening mental acuity
斯特曼癌症中心提供开创性的基于细胞的黑色素瘤治疗位于圣路易斯巴恩斯犹太医院和华盛顿大学医学院的斯特曼癌症中心是全国首批提供新批准的针对黑色素瘤的细胞免疫疗法的中心之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Pioneering-cell-based-treatment-for-melanoma-offered-at-Siteman-Cancer-Center.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Pioneering-cell-based-treatment-for-melanoma-offered-at-Siteman-Cancer-Center.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1fc3de9-e0d3-42fd-b3d0-9779e1a85c7b Tue, 20 Feb 2024 23:36:55 -0500 Pioneering cell-based treatment for melanoma offered at Siteman Cancer Center
用 HDAC 抑制剂解锁非激素男性避孕药调查显示，大多数美国男性对使用男性避孕药具感兴趣，但他们的选择仍然仅限于不可靠的避孕套或侵入性输精管切除术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Unlocking-non-hormonal-male-contraception-with-HDAC-inhibitors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Unlocking-non-hormonal-male-contraception-with-HDAC-inhibitors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d2fd53d-9c07-494c-a5d1-e74f6e458ed6 Tue, 20 Feb 2024 23:28:32 -0500 Unlocking non-hormonal male contraception with HDAC inhibitors
恢复大脑通路以对抗阿片类药物成瘾南卡罗来纳医科大学的科学家在《神经元》杂志上报告说，他们发现了一种在临床前模型中恢复阿片类药物削弱的大脑通路的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Restoring-brain-pathways-to-fight-opioid-addiction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Restoring-brain-pathways-to-fight-opioid-addiction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eba7bfbe-50a3-47cb-9200-aa8c0b6a0e6d Tue, 20 Feb 2024 23:05:50 -0500 Restoring brain pathways to fight opioid addiction
新的治疗策略显示出对抗儿童常见肝癌的希望肝母细胞瘤（HB）是儿童中最常见的肝癌。该领域的研究人员和医生对此感到担忧，因为在过去十年中，HB 在全球范围内迅速上升，并且是所有儿童实体瘤中增长最快的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Novel-treatment-strategy-shows-promise-against-common-liver-cancer-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Novel-treatment-strategy-shows-promise-against-common-liver-cancer-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ba3797f-dc72-4662-9888-c48357f47d96 Tue, 20 Feb 2024 23:02:12 -0500 Novel treatment strategy shows promise against common liver cancer in children
克服低收入患者饮食失调治疗的障碍威尔康奈尔医学院和哥伦比亚大学瓦格洛斯内科和外科医生学院的研究人员表示，低收入的饮食失调患者经常被误诊，并且无法获得适当的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Overcoming-barriers-to-eating-disorder-treatment-for-low-venue-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Overcoming-barriers-to-eating-disorder-treatment-for-low-venue-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=caa2a30f-6acf-4883-97c2-4fd5cd8bfcea Tue, 20 Feb 2024 22:54:14 -0500 Overcoming barriers to eating disorder treatment for low-income patients
女性比男性从锻炼中获得更多健康益处女性从体力活动中获得的健康益处比男性更大，这表明需要鼓励更多女性参加锻炼，以降低心血管疾病和全因死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Women-gain-more-health-benefits-from-exercise-than-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Women-gain-more-health-benefits-from-exercise-than-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb3ebd30-1fc2-40a4-9546-0b29bfc1f4b5 Tue, 20 Feb 2024 22:45:00 -0500 Women gain more health benefits from exercise than men
科学家发现对抗神经退行性疾病的新治疗方法由凯斯西储大学医学院的科学家领导的研究小组发现了一种对抗神经退行性疾病的新治疗方法，为改善阿尔茨海默病、帕金森病、白质消失病和多发性硬化症等疾病的治疗带来了希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Scientists-identify-new-therapeutic-approach-for-combating-neurodogenic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Scientists-identify-new-therapeutic-approach-for-combating-neurodogenic-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29a55a7e-c1cc-446f-97c2-cea4b85a7c2a Tue, 20 Feb 2024 22:43:27 -0500 Scientists identify new therapeutic approach for combating neurodegenerative diseases
